Package drcl.comp.tool

Class Summary
ComponentDebugger Can specify a set of keyword combinations to filter out unrelated events.
ComponentMonitor A simple text display component.
ComponentTester This tester component is designed for testing a component.
CountMonitor This component monitors an "object stream" (defined by Countable) and outputs average rate.
CountMonitor2 This component monitors an "object stream" (defined by Countable) and outputs its average rate and object loss rate.
DataCounter This component counts the number of data coming in at any of its ports.
DotDump Static methods to visualize JavaSim component connections as a directed graph.
DotDump2 This class adds "blocking" capability to DotDump.
DrclPlotFrame  
EventTester An event-based component testing engine.
HistogramPlotter  
PlotPlain The class works similar to Plotter except that the results are outputted to files in a simple format of "x-value{ValueSeparator}y-value" per line.
Plotter  
RunningAverage  
TimerList Maintains a set of timers.
